DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Changes Prescribing Behavior ER/LA Opioid Prescribers
DOC.detailed_description: A study perform evaluate change prescribe behavior prescribers . 1 . For product indicate use opioid-tolerant patient ( i.e. , fentanyl transdermal patch , extended-release hydromorphone pill extended-release morphine pill > 90mg ) , describe trend proportion prescription product opioid-non-tolerant patient year precede availability REMS-compliant CE course compare proportion prescription opioid non-tolerant patient pre- versus post-REMS CE course availability 2 . For product whose label indicate high dosage strength use opioid-tolerant patient , describe trend proportion prescription prescribe opioid non-tolerant patient high start dosage strength ; compare proportion prescription product prescribe opioid non-tolerant patient high start dosage strength pre- versus post-REMS CE course availability 3 . Describe trend proportion prescription ER/LA opioids prescribe patient early refill prescription compare proportion pre- versus post-REMS CE course availability . 4 . Compare concomitant use benzodiazepine ER/LA opioids REMS implementation .
